list.name: BACK-TO-THE-FINXTURE
list.description: Finx steps back in time, returning to the position and ammo he had x seconds ago.
list.descriptionHtml: Finx steps back in time, returning to the position and ammo he had x seconds ago.

list.name: NO-ESCAPE
list.description: Finx's next center projectile from his main attack freezes the enemy in time for x seconds, making them unable to take actions for the duration, but also making them immune to any damage.
list.descriptionHtml: Finx's next center projectile from his main attack freezes the enemy in time for x seconds, making them unable to take actions for the duration, but also making them immune to any damage.
